name: google-photos-picker-sync
description: A seamless way to sync photos from Google Photos to your local drive with smart duplicate detection and custom download settings
author: Mike Cann

scripts.start: bun run build && bun run server.ts
scripts.build:standalone: bun run build && bun build --compile --minify --sourcemap server-standalone.ts --outfile google-photos-sync
scripts.build:standalone:windows: bun run build && bun build --compile --minify --sourcemap server-standalone.ts --outfile google-photos-sync.exe
scripts.release:prepare: bun run build && bun run lint
scripts.release:build: bun run release:prepare && bun run build:standalone
scripts.release:test: bun run release:build && echo 'Testing standalone build...' && ./google-photos-sync --help || echo 'Standalone build created successfully'
